name: cse_5914_sp25
description: This project aims to develop a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system that leverages ElasticSearch for efficiently querying a large database of Tweets and Reddit comments (datasets linked below).  Dynamic generation of relevant posts, comments, or threads in response to user-defined topics.  ElasticSearch â€“ rapid retrieval of contextual and semantically aligned data from the social media corpus.  Data serves as a real-world basis for prompts or supporting material for the generative model.  Automated engagement = endorphins go brr.
